sentences.en: A booster does of tetanus toxoid and penicillin should be administered.
sentences.cn: 给予破伤风类毒素加强剂与青霉素.

sentences.en: Fleming discovered penicillin by accident in 1928.
sentences.cn: 弗莱明在1928年偶然发现了青霉素.

sentences.en: For such patients, benzathine penicillin by injection monthly is recommended.
sentences.cn: 对这类患者, 每日可注射一次苄星青霉素.
他对青霉素的反应良好。

sentences.en: I have an allergy to penicillin.
sentences.cn: 我对青霉素有过敏反应.

sentences.en: I knew there was one cure: penicillin.
sentences.cn: 我知道有一种有效药：盘尼西林。

sentences.en: I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin.
sentences.cn: 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的.

sentences.en: I think we were fooled by penicillin.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们都被青霉素愚弄了。

sentences.en: It is easily abated by the use of penicillin.
sentences.cn: 应用青霉素可以容易地把它消灭.

sentences.en: One dose of penicillin can wipe out the infection.
sentences.cn: 一剂青霉素就能消除感染。

sentences.en: Penicillin cured him of his pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 青霉素治好了他的肺炎.

sentences.en: Penicillin is arguably the greatest medical discovery of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 盘尼西林大概是二十世纪医学上最伟大的发现.

sentences.en: Penicillin was an extremely significant medical discovery.
sentences.cn: 青霉素是极其重要的医学发现.

sentences.en: Reading the patient's file, Andrew observed the warning about Penicillin.
sentences.cn: 阅读病历时, 安德鲁看到了青霉素的记号.

sentences.en: She injected the patient with penicillin.
sentences.cn: 她给病人注射了青霉素.

sentences.en: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.cn: 这确实加快了青霉素作为抗生素的发展。

sentences.en: The patient had an allergy to penicillin.
They wrote off for a fresh supply of penicillin.
sentences.cn: 他们发信要求再供应一批青霉素.

sentences.en: Wyrazik had not, until that time, known about his allergy to penicillin.
sentences.cn: 在这之前, 怀拉兹克并不知道自己对青霉素过敏.

trans.tran_en: a type of medicine that is used to treat infections caused by  bacteria
